tool.name: Get the parent terms of a given OBO term
tool.description: Collects the parent terms from a given term in the given OBO ontology
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Collects the parent terms (list of IDs) from a given term (existing ID) in the given OBO ontology.
**Example**
If you ask for the parents of the Gene Ontology term with ID **GO:0000079** you will get::
GO:0045859 regulation of protein kinase activity GO:0051726 regulation of cell cycle
